rows.HOOK LIBRARY: 100+ proven hooks categorized by type - the first 3 seconds
WHY HOOKS MATTER
You have 1-3 seconds to stop the scroll.
The hook is 80% of whether an ad works.
Great product + bad hook = no one sees it.
Bad product + great hook = at least you learn something.
HOOK CATEGORIES
PROBLEM/PAIN HOOKS
"I was so tired of feeling exhausted by 2pm..."
"If you're dealing with muscle cramps, watch this"
"Nobody talks about why you feel like garbage on keto"
"The worst part about being dehydrated isn't the thirst"
"I spent 3 years wondering why I had no energy"
"POV: You're on day 3 of keto and want to die"
"Stop drinking water if you're still feeling dehydrated"
"Why does everyone feel like crap in the afternoon?"
"The reason you can't focus has nothing to do with sleep"
"If your pee is clear but you still feel dehydrated..."

"The difference between 3 minerals and 78 is insane"

VISUAL HOOKS (What to show)
• Product pour/mix (satisfying)
• Before/after energy levels
• Ingredient comparison (us vs them)
• Ocean footage (sourcing story)
• Workout/lifestyle with product
• Reaction to first taste
• Text on screen with bold claim
• Face close-up with emotion
• Unboxing moment
• Side-by-side product comparison
